author: David Hodari
title: Stocks Hover as Treasury Yields Hold Near Recent Highs
text:
U.S. stocks little changed Treasury yields, dollar edge down Retail stocks rise after Macyâ€™s earnings U.S. stocks were little changed Wednesday, as investors weighed continued worries about tighter financial conditions and geopolitical tensions against gains in retail stocks.
The Dow Jones Industrial Averaged inched up 5 points, or less than 0.1%, to 24713. The blue-chip index snapped an eight-session winning streak Tuesday and remains more than 7% off its January all-time high. The S&P 500 added 0.1%, and the Nasdaq... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
